item.title: CVS says blaming drug middlemen for higher prices is ‘deceptive rhetoric’
item.description: CVS’s stock soared toward a three-month high after its quarterly profit beat expectations by the widest margin in more than four years.

item.title: Oil prices decline as U.S. crude supplies climb for a third week in a row
item.description: Oil futures looked to post a loss Wednesday, their first in four sessions, after official U.S. data revealed a third straight weekly climb in U.S. cru...

item.title: Why Micron’s stock is leading the chip sector’s decline
item.description: Micron CFO Mark Murphy mentioned various factors that could weigh on margins for next quarter, but he also said that period should mark the low point.

item.title: I’m a wife and mother. Can I secretly change my will and leave everything to my daughter instead of my husband?
Lyft has ‘no obvious answers’ for its growth woes, as its stock declines
item.description: One issue for Lyft is a downturn in pricing trends, which numerous analysts keyed in on as they looked to make sense of the path forward.
